repnme.cdata!:
Indonesia - Second Private Development
            Finance Company (PDFCI) Project

abstracts.cdata!:
A relending program by PDFCI to finance
            specific development projects in Indonesia. The loan also
            includes funds for the services of an expert at an estimated
            cost of $75,000 per man-year to help PDFCI carry out its operations.

            Finance Company (PDFCI) Project
